note:
I write a bunch of code (mainly Python), have cats, tinker with and detail cars, and fiddle with FreeBSD. I like taking (making?) photos. Playing with Internet stuff since '96. Interested in kernels, protocols, and inner workings in general. Intermittent cyclist. Cloudy Amazonian, and they tell me my opinions are my own.

Profile pic is a cartoon smiley cup of coffee. Banner image is a selfie-style photo of ginger cat sitting on a humanâ€™s lap at a desk, with his front paws resting on the desk.
